subject: Soccer
United States Open Cup (Soccer)
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: For the second straight year, the Cosmos eliminated an M.L.S. team in the United States Open Cup, which has been a quandary for clubs in the top tier of American soccer.
snippet: For the second straight year, the Cosmos eliminated an M.L.S. team in the United States Open Cup, which has been a quandary for clubs in the top tier of American soccer.
